::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus nods. "Of course, there are always more battles, no matter 
what."

He scanns the horizon, his eyes stopping for several moments on the 
destroyed shore of Spain, three miles away. "There will be battles as 
long as life exists."

He looks back at Bigfish and then at DevilDuer.

"DevilDuer will show you around. I have some things to take care of, 
but if you need to talk to me, I am contactable with the comm."

DevilDuer nods and looks at Bigfish. "Wanna follow me and get 
yourself some quarters?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The explosions in the Iron Fist did little damage to it. The hallways 
were charred and bent where the two bots exploded, but work drones 
got to the repairs almost instantly.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Big fish" <Bigfish1011@h...> wrote:
> :::Bigfish:::
> "I missed the battle.  Ah thats to bad. But there will be others, 
right?"
